attributes.action: Keep Formula 1 live on free to air TV !
attributes.additional_details:
For background information please see reads comments on the guardian's newspaper article link at 

http://www.theguardian.com/sport/2016/mar/23/sky-buys-exclusive-rights-to-all-formula-one
attributes.background: I feel upset and other fans feel the same  that Sky can get the full rights to formula 1 and can have a monopoly  so that the British public will be held to ransom as F1 has been on free to air TV for many years.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/125622
